title.rendered: Commonwealth Charter: Tenth Anniversary Special Edition

content.rendered:
The Foundation celebrated the tenth anniversary of the signing of the Commonwealth Charter by producing this special copy of the document. A print version was shared with guests at our Charter celebration event at the South Africa High Commission on 16 March 2023. It is now available for you to download and share online.

Commonwealth Charter: Tenth Anniversary Special Edition
